titleStmt.title: No nevvs, but a letter to every body. Prescribed, to your truly beloved self; any where: so that you be not resolved to be, who and where you should not be; with care and speed, these be presented. / And subscribed, your daily orator at the throne of grace, R.W.
titleStmt.author: R. W.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
